lu.uni.geko.util.tostring
Class EMFToString

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.util.tostring.ToString
      lu.uni.geko.util.tostring.EMFToString

public final class EMFToString
extends ToString

A utility class for providing custom string representations of models conforming to Ecore metamodels similar to the default Object.toString().

(Note that this class itself does not use the fact that it allows instances of it to be created but overrides behaviour of ToString. If Java would allow static methods to be overridden (nobody knows how) we could implement this the way a utility class should be implemented.)

appendFeatureNameAndValueIfNotNull

private boolean appendFeatureNameAndValueIfNotNull(StringBuilder s,
                                                   String prefix,
                                                   org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject eObject,
                                                   org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature> features,
                                                   int featureIndex)
Appends the name of the feature with the given feature index together with its value for the given eObject to the given StringBuilder using the given prefix if the feature value is not null.

Parameters:
s - the StringBuilder to append to
prefix - the prefix to be appended before the feature name and value
eObject - the eObject for which the feature value should be appended
features - a list containing features of the given eObject
featureIndex - the index of the feature to be appended in the given list
Returns:
whether something was append or not

getEObjectID

private String getEObjectID(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject eObject)
Returns a ID for the given eObject consisting of the class name and the hash code.

Parameters:
eObject - an eObject
Returns:
the ID

getFeatureNameAndValueAtIndex

private String getFeatureNameAndValueAtIndex(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject eObject,
                                             org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature> features,
                                             int featureIndex)
Returns the name of the feature with the given feature index together with its value for the given eObject if the feature value is not null. Returns null otherwise.

Parameters:
eObject - the eObject for which the feature value should be returned
features - a list containing features of the given eObject
featureIndex - the index of the feature to be returned in the given list
Returns:
the feature name and value separated by "="
